channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 17:09 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region. Stop after further messages.
item.description: 🟢 17:09 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region. Stop after further messages.#Chernihiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 17:09 Driven the alarm to the Poltava region. Watch for further messages.
